lines.text: Recently, the Attorney General of California wrote to us
complaining about a number of NASCAR Winston Racing Series signs
which remain at one or more tracks in California. You might still have
some of these signs at your facility.
While it may seem surprising to you that the AG is concerned that
these mentions of the Series do any harm to anyone, it is clear that, under
the terms of the Master Settlement Agreement entered into between R. J.
Reynolds Tobacco Company and various states, including California, RJR
could not post signage mentioning the Series today.
While we no longer are the series sponsor, we recognize that if
these signs remain, they belong to you and are on your property. The
decision to remove them is yours. However, in a spirit of cooperation with
the AG, we ask that the word "Winston" in signs referring to the "NASCAR
Winston Racing Series" be removed or painted over. We understand that

RJReynolds

RICHARD M. SANDERS
Senior Vice President - Marketing
President - Sports Marketing Enterprises
January 19, 2001

Winston-Salem, NC 27102-0484

Fax: 336-741-2800
E-Mait: sanderr@rjrt.com
Chip Rowen
MOTORDROME SPEEDWAY
RR 1 Box 88A
Smithton, PA 15479
Dear Chip:
Recently, the Attorney General of California wrote to us
complaining about a number of NASCAR Winston Racing Series signs
which remain at one or more tracks in California. You might still have
some of these signs at your facility.
While it may seem surprising to you that the AG is concerned that
these mentions of the Series do any harm to anyone, it is clear that, under
the terms of the Master Settlement Agreement entered into between R. J.
Reynolds Tobacco Company and various states, including California, RJR
could not post signage mentioning the Series today.
While we no longer are the series sponsor, we recognize that if
these signs remain, they belong to you and are on your property. The
decision to remove them is yours. However, in a spirit of cooperation with
the AG, we ask that the word "Winston" in signs referring to the "NASCAR
Winston Racing Series" be removed or painted over. We understand that
